General.Name: Essex Property Trust Inc.
General.Description: Essex Property Trust, Inc., an S&P 500 company, is a fully integrated real estate investment trust (REIT) that acquires, develops, redevelops, and manages multifamily residential properties in selected West Coast markets. Essex currently has ownership interests in 252 apartment communities comprising approximately 62,000 apartment homes with an additional property in active development.
General.Address: 1100 Park Place, San Mateo, CA, United States, 94403
